properties.areaDesc: Northeast Mountains; Northern Panhandle; Central Panhandle Mountains
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 1 at 2:36PM PST until February 1 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph. Gusts to 45 mph in
exposed valleys with gusts 50 to 60 mph in the mountains.

* WHERE...In Washington, Northeast Mountains, especially from
Deer Park to Colville eastward. In Idaho, Northern Panhandle
and Central Panhandle Mountains.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM PST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Weakened trees or tree limbs could be blown down and power
outages may result.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will gradually decrease by late
afternoon.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. This may impact travel on mountain roads and
passes. Secure any outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING
